title: Businessweek Extra - Ian Schrager
itunes:title: Businessweek Extra - Ian Schrager
description:
Hosted by Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.

Featuring an in-depth conversation with Ian Schrager, Founder of The Ian Schrager Company, on his collaboration with the Times Square Edition Hotel, the social media society and his favorite memories from ’Studio 54’.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
